{"id":1264712182,"question_id":3427,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 1 week","timestamp":1716366076,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"226 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1264712182/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Special Array II","memory":"135.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<bool> isArraySpecial(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        vector<int>pref(nums.size(),0);\n        pref[0]=0;\n        for(int i=1;i<nums.size();i++){\n            if(nums[i]%2==nums[i-1]%2){\n                pref[i]=pref[i-1]+1;\n            }\n            else{\n                pref[i]=pref[i-1];\n            }\n        }\n        vector<bool>h;\n        for(int i=0;i<queries.size();i++){\n            vector<int>c=queries[i];\n            long long int x=c[0];\n            long long int y=c[1];\n            if(pref[y]-pref[x]!=0){\n                h.push_back(false);\n            }\n            else{\n            h.push_back(true);\n            }\n        }\n        return h;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"special-array-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
